title: Update welcome message to OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION

requirements.text: Change the welcome text from 'WELCOME TO BUSINESS STORE' to 'WELCOME TO OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION' in the product catalog hero section

quotes: CHANGE FROM "WELCOME TO BUSINESS STORE " TO "WELCOME OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION".

acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays 'WELCOME TO OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION' instead of the old text
The text maintains the same styling and prominence as before
